[vc_section][vc_row el_class=”col-md-10 col-md-offset-1 pad-t2 pad-b2″][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

For over 50 years

JET Plumbing & Drain Services has worked with local general contractors on many projects. From the construction of the Meadowwood Mall Food Court to remodels to fire damage re-constructions, our professional plumbers have created or re-created custom living spaces to meet the needs of our customers. Whether you are replacing a fixture or remodeling a kitchen, we have experience and personnel to complete any size job.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center pad-t2″]Schedule An Appointment[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section el_class=”col-md-12″][vc_row el_class=”col-md-10 col-md-offset-1″][vc_column][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”pad-t3 pad-b3″]
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”col-md-10 col-md-offset-1″]

Kitchen and Faucets

Jet Plumbing currently stocks Moen’s CFG faucet as a competitive replacement for both the kitchen and bath. These quality faucets are available in single handle models and kitchen faucets come with or without a side sprayer. Jet Plumbing will warranty the faucet for 10 years when installed by one of our experienced plumbers. For more information on these brands please “click” on the Moen picture to the left and you will be linked directly to their website.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”pad-t3 pad-b3″][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”col-md-10 col-md-offset-1″]

Toilets

Since the introduction of the 1.6 gallon per flush low-flow toilet, manufacturers have been constantly changing the design to produce a better flushing action. Today, 18 years after it’s predecessor was first introduced to the public, we are now able to offer the many styles and brands that will complement your home. We currently stock Gerber Maxwell toilets for their looks and functionality. For more information “click” on the Gerber picture and you will be directed to the Kohler website.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”pad-b3″][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”pad-t3 pad-b3″][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”col-md-10 col-md-offset-1″]

Water Heaters

Bradford White’s high quality units are made in Michigan and are only sold and installed through a local licensed plumbing professional. JET Plumbing is the only FACTORY AUTHORIZED SERVICE REPRESENTATIVE for Bradford White brand water heaters in the Reno & Carson City Area. This means that when we install your new water heater you not only have invested in a great product, you are assured that JET Plumbing is one call away from any repairs needed down the road. We offer prompt 24 hour service on all water heaters that we sell and carry a large inventory of repair parts for models including State Industries, Rheem, Ruud, G.E., and A.O. Smith units.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”pad-b3″][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”pad-t3 pad-b3″][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”col-md-10 col-md-offset-1″]

Backflow Testing & Repair

All commercial buildings are required to have a properly installed and operational commercial backflow valves on the buildings main water service. This device, known as a reduced pressure backflow preventer or RPBP, is an important safety device designed to prevent the possibility of contaminated water from back feeding to the municipal water system, should there be a drop in pressure through the line. In water supply systems, water is normally maintained at a significant pressure to enable water to flow from the tap, shower, or other fixture. Water pressure may fail or be reduced when a water main bursts, pipes freeze, or there is unexpectedly high demand on the water system (for example, when several fire hydrants are opened). Reduced pressure in the pipe may allow contaminated water from the soil, from storage, or from other sources to be drawn up into the system.

By law these devices have to be tested annually by certified & licensed personnel and Jet Plumbing can perform this test, usually within 48 hours. And if the initial test fails, Jet Plumbing’s technicians are also qualified to make repairs and retest the system. Not every licensed tester is able to do that which could save time and money.

Call Jet Plumbing today at 331-3933 or simply fax your Truckee Meadows Water Authority “Backflow Prevention Compliance Notification” sheet to 331-5584. We will call with a no obligation quote and schedule an appointment for the test.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class=”text-center pad-t5 pad-b5″][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center”]

Have a plumbing problem? Contact us today!

Schedule An Appointment[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
